document.discussion_title: SHEPARD: Need To Play Smarter And Play Above Our Years | Best Bucs Coverage | 98ROCK
document.topic_text: Tampa Bay Buccaneers WR Russell Shepard Spoke Following The 17-9 Loss To The Philadelphia Eagles On Thursday Night. Audio Is Courtesy Of The Tampa Bay Buccaneers, And The Tampa Bay Buccaneers Radio Network
